summary: In order to be able to get the names of winning horses at the track, Sach agrees to sell his soul to the devil.
cast: Huntz Hall|Stanley Clements|David Gorcey|Eddie LeRoy|Dick Elliott|Judy Bamber|Byron Foulger|Ralph Sanford|Ric Roman|Joe Devlin|Sam Bagley|Harry Baum|Charles Cirillo|Fritz Feld|James Flavin|Earle Hodgins|Carl M. Leviness|Wilbur Mack|John Mitchum|Jack Mulhall|Benny Rubin|Sally Yarnell
title: Up in Smoke
